benchmark_details.name: 3DBench: A Scalable 3D Benchmark and Instruction-Tuning Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: 3DBench is a scalable benchmark designed for evaluating 3D-LLMs covering ten diverse multi-modal tasks with three types of evaluation metrics.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish a scalable evaluation benchmark specifically designed for assessing 3D-LLMs.

data.source: Generated using the Procthor simulation framework and includes data collected from 30,000 houses.
data.annotation: Ground-truth is incorporated into diverse dialogue templates.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on heuristics for text generation tasks and traditional metrics for detection and VG tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in spatial reasoning and dialog generation capabilities.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments evaluating trending MLLMs and comparisons against existing datasets.
